description.@en: A breath of spring to restore your aches and pains . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting, one ally reduces the time to Recuperate from one Injury by three days.

criticalSuccess.@en: They reduce the time to Recuperate from all Injuries by nine days instead.

criticalFailure.@en: The wind blows you over, as you suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] Damage, but do not suffer Injuries due to it.

reagents.@en: A bottle of spring air, which you inhale and exhale over an Injured ally
